FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Common questions and answers about creating MVPs and acquiring users

cities.question: In which cities are the activities held?
cities.answer: Activities cover major Asia-Pacific cities, including Bangkok, Ho Chi Minh City, Kuala Lumpur, Singapore, Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Hangzhou, etc. Online workshops are not geographically restricted and can be participated in at any time.

background.question: What technical background is required to participate?
background.answer: Suitable for those with programming background, AIGC capabilities, product design, operational experience, or Web3/AI enthusiasts. Different topics have different technical background requirements, which we will inform in advance.

benefits.question: What can you get by participating in the activities?
benefits.answer: Hackathon prizes, incubator connections, investment opportunities, limited NFT badges, exclusive merchandise, and opportunities to have late-night ramen sessions with top VCs.

sponsorship.question: How to become a sponsor?
sponsorship.answer: Sponsorship starts at $8,000, providing year-round brand exposure, customized themed hackathons, early access to high-quality developers, and other benefits. Contact ian@openbuild.xyz for details.

HandbookOverview.title: AI³ Growth Journey Introduction
HandbookOverview.subtitle: A trans-Pacific AI+Web3 developer awakening movement, exploring cutting-edge technologies and building innovative applications through hands-on experience

features.community: Jointly launched by top Asia-Pacific communities
features.communityDesc: OpenBuild (Asia-Pacific's largest Web3 open source community) and HackathonWeekly (China's most vibrant AI product creator community) jointly launch
features.activitiesDesc: Monthly online AI+Web3 workshops and offline mini-hackathons, covering China, Thailand, Vietnam, Malaysia, Singapore, India, and other regions
features.innovationDesc: Explore cutting-edge topics such as AI Smart Contracts, Web3 AI Agents, OnChain Data Insights, AIGC Gaming, etc.
features.participationDesc: Open to developers, contributors, and sponsors, providing hackathon prizes, incubator connections, and investment opportunities
features.durationDesc: Starting from March, continuously conducted for the next 10 months, unlocking a disruptive proposition each month
features.rewardsDesc: Limited edition 'Cyber Merit' NFT badges, HackathonWeekly X OpenBuild exclusive merchandise, and late-night ramen sessions with top VCs

benefits.skillsDesc: Quickly master AI+Web3 cutting-edge technology stacks and development experience through hands-on projects
benefits.networkDesc: Connect with 15,000+ developers and top investors, obtain high-quality project incubation opportunities
benefits.opportunityDesc: Explore the birth of the next unicorn project at the frontier where AI and Web3 collide
benefits.communityDesc: Become an active member of the developer community, jointly promoting technological development and innovative application implementation

ContentStructure.title: Thematic Content
ContentStructure.subtitle: Unlock a disruptive proposition every month, exploring the infinite possibilities of AI and Web3 integration
ContentStructure.casesSubtitle: In the case study section, we provide three important types of learning resources

topics.aiSmartContractDesc: Explore how to use AI code assistants (such as Cursor, Copilot) to efficiently write and optimize smart contracts, improving Web3 development efficiency.
topics.web3AiAgentDesc: Learn to build blockchain-based AI agents to achieve automated trading, intelligent asset management, and decentralized decision-making systems.
topics.onchainDataAiDesc: Master methods of using AI technology to analyze blockchain data, discover market trends, user behavior patterns, and DeFi strategy optimization.
topics.aiGamingDesc: Learn how to combine AI-generated content with Web3 games to create unique game assets, dynamic game worlds, and personalized game experiences.
topics.noCodeDappsDesc: Explore the possibility of building decentralized applications with no-code tools, allowing more non-technical creators to participate in Web3 innovation.

cases.contractGeneration: Case Study: Smart Contract Automated Generation
cases.contractGenerationDesc: Use AI to assist in designing, writing, and auditing smart contracts, significantly improving development efficiency and security
cases.tradingAgent: Case Study: Autonomous Trading AI Agent
cases.tradingAgentDesc: Build AI agents capable of autonomous DeFi trading decisions based on on-chain data and market analysis
cases.nftGameAssets: Case Study: NFT Game Asset Generation
cases.nftGameAssetsDesc: Use AIGC technology to batch create unique game assets and integrate with blockchain to achieve true ownership

TargetAudience.title: Target Participants
TargetAudience.subtitle: Recruiting developers, contributors, and sponsors to jointly explore the future of AI+Web3

audiences.developersDesc: Technical personnel with programming background or AI/Web3 enthusiasts who want to explore AI+Web3 fusion innovation
audiences.contributorsDesc: Technical evangelists, project alchemists, activity creators, and other contributors who want to jointly promote AI+Web3 development
audiences.sponsorsDesc: Institutions and enterprises focusing on AI+Web3 innovation fields, hoping to connect with high-quality developers and projects

CommunityJoin.title: Join the AI³ Growth Journey Developer Community
CommunityJoin.description: Explore AI+Web3 cutting-edge technologies with 15,000+ developers, participate in Asia-Pacific's most vibrant developer activities, and your project will traverse the 200,000+ developer network, reaching the radar of top incubators and investors
